sentence.Network_en: Noctilucent clouds were first observed in 1885 by an amateur astronomer.
sentence.Network_cn: 1885年,一位业余天文学爱好者最早观察到夜光云.

sentence.Network_en: Rare earth noctilucent fibers are a kind of new materials, provided with special function.
sentence.Network_cn: 稀土夜光纤维是一种具有特殊功能的新型材料.

sentence.Network_en: The preparation technique and application of noctilucent powder and noctilucent glaze were introduced in this paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了夜光粉和夜光釉的制作方法及其应用.

per全部,整个+noct夜晚+ation表名词→n.彻夜不眠
